snippet.title: Excessive Speed (Iridon Interactive AB.) (1999)
snippet.description:
For starters, I'm sorry for the bad gameplay and the buggy graphics (while loading the game or navigating through the game-menu's) This game has been recorded with a programme that's not in my standarts. So excuse me for this!

Your objective is simple: its either finish first or get finished off. You must win, using any and every method at your disposal, fair or (usually) foul. As you violently battle your way around the tracks while bumping into walls, other cars, or make your acquaintance with landmines, your vehicle will take damage. Reach zero, and youre out of the game bigtime as your vehicle explodes into flames. During your frenzied laps, youll see various power-ups randomly strewn here and there that will help you out, if you can grab them before anyone else, that is. Welcome to Excessive Speed!
